Absorb.Description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Acid.Description: The opposing team is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. The acid may also lower the targets' Sp. Def stats.

Acid Armor.Description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

Acid Spray.Description: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly reduces the target's Sp. Def stat.

Acrobatics.Description: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.

Acupressure.Description: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its stats.

Aerial Ace.Description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. The attack lands without fail.

Aeroblast.Description: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage. Critical hits land more easily.

After You.Description: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

Agility.Description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

Air Cutter.Description: The user launches razorlike wind to slash the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Air Slash.Description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

Ally Switch.Description: The user teleports using a strange power and switches its place with one of its allies.

Amnesia.Description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

AncientPower.Description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user's stats at once.

Aqua Jet.Description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

Aqua Ring.Description: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP on every turn.

Aqua Tail.Description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

Arm Thrust.Description: The user looses a flurry of open-palmed arm thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.

Aromatherapy.Description: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status problems affecting the user's party.

Assist.Description: The user hurriedly and randomly uses a move among those known by other Pokémon in the party.

Assurance.Description: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

Astonish.Description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

Attack Order.Description: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. Critical hits land more easily.

Attract.Description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

Aura Sphere.Description: The user looses a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This move is certain to hit.

Aurora Beam.Description: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

Automize.Description: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.

Avalanche.Description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the target in the same turn.

Barrage.Description: Round objects are hurled at the target to strike two to five times in a row.

Barrier.Description: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

Baton Pass.Description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, passing along any stat changes.

Beat Up.Description: The user gets all party Pokémon to attack the target. The more party Pokémon, the greater the number of attacks.

Belly Drum.Description: The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.

Bestow.Description: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn't holding an item

Bide.Description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

Bind.Description: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

Bite.Description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

Blast Burn.Description: The target is razed by a fiery explosion. The user must rest on the next turn, however.

Blaze Kick.Description: The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit more easily. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Blizzard.Description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the opposing team. It may also freeze them solid.

Block.Description: The user blocks the target's way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.

Blue Flare.Description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. It may leave the target with a burn.

Body Slam.Description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Bolt Strike.Description: The user charges at its target, surrounding itself with a great amount of electricity. It may leave the target with paralysis.

Bone Club.Description: The user clubs the target with a bone. It may also make the target flinch.

Bone Rush.Description: The user strikes the target with a hard bone two to five times in a row.

Bonemerang.Description: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops to hit the target twice, coming and going.

Bounce.Description: The user bounces up high, then drops on the target on the second turn. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Brave Bird.Description: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. The user also takes serious damage.

Brick Break.Description: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect.

Brine.Description: If the target's HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.

Bubble.Description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing team. It may also lower the targets' Speed stats.

BubbleBeam.Description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the opposing team. It may also lower their Speed stats

Bug Bite.Description: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

Bug Buzz.Description: The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Bulk Up.Description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting both its Attack and Defense stats.

Bulldoze.Description: The user stomps down on the ground and attacks everything in the area. Hit Pokémon's Speed stat is reduced.

Bullet Punch.Description: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

Bullet Seed.Description: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target. Two to five seeds are shot in rapid succession.

Calm Mind.Description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

Camouflage.Description: The user’s type is changed depending on its environment, such as at water’s edge, in grass, or in a cave.

Captivate.Description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target is charmed into harshly lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

Charge.Description: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. It also raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

Charge Beam.Description: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

Charm.Description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. The target's Attack is harshly lowered.

Chatter.Description: The user attacks using a sound wave based on words it has learned. It may also confuse the target.

Chip Away.Description: Looking for an opening, the user strikes continually. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

Circle Throw.Description: The user throws the target and drags out another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

Clamp.Description: The target is clamped and squeezed by the user's very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.

Clear Smog.Description: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All status changes are returned to normal.

Close Combat.Description: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user's Defense and Sp. Def.

Coil.Description: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

Comet Punch.Description: The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.

Confuse Ray.Description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

Confusion.Description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

Constrict.Description: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. It may also lower the target's Speed stat.

Conversion.Description: The user changes its type to become the same type as one of its moves.

Conversion2.Description: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack the opponent used last.

Copycat.Description: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

Cosmic Power.Description: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

Cotton Guard.Description: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, drastically raising the user's Defense stat.

Cotton Spore.Description: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to the target, harshly reducing its Speed stat.

Counter.Description: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

Covet.Description: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target's held item.

Crabhammer.Description: The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.

Cross Chop.Description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.

Cross Poison.Description: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also leave the target poisoned. Critical hits land more easily.

Crunch.Description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

Crush Claw.Description: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. It may also lower the target's Defense.

Crush Grip.Description: The target is crushed with great force. The attack is more powerful the more HP the target has left.

Curse.Description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

Cut.Description: The target is cut with a scythe or a claw. It can also be used to cut down thin trees.

Dark Pulse.Description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.

Dark Void.Description: Opposing Pokémon are dragged into a world of total darkness that makes sleep.

Defend Order.Description: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

Defense Curl.Description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

Defog.Description: A strong wind blows away the target's obstacles such as Reflect or Light Screen. It also lowers the target's evasiveness.

Destiny Bond.Description: When this move is used, if the user faints, the foe that landed the knockout hit also faints.

Detect.Description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

Dig.Description: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.

Disable.Description: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

Discharge.Description: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike the area around the user. It may also cause paralysis.

Dive.Description: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the second turn. It can be used to dive deep in the ocean.

Dizzy Punch.Description: The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches that may also leave it confused.

Doom Desire.Description: Two turns after this move is used, the user blasts the target with a concentrated bundle of light.

Double Hit.Description: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

Double Kick.Description: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

Double Team.Description: The user creates illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

Double-Edge.Description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.

DoubleSlap.Description: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

Draco Meteor.Description: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The attack's recoil harshly reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

Dragon Claw.Description: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws.

Dragon Dance.Description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its Attack and Speed stats.

Dragon Pulse.Description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

Dragon Rage.Description: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage

Dragon Rush.Description: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. It may also make the target flinch.

Dragon Tail.Description: The user knocks away the target and drags out another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

DragonBreath.Description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Drain Punch.Description: An energy-draining punch. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Dream Eater.Description: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user's HP.

Drill Peck.Description: A corkscrewing attack with the sharp beak acting as a drill.

Drill Run.Description: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

Dual Chop.Description: The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal strikes. The target is hit twice in a row.

DynamicPunch.Description: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. It confuses the target if it hits.

Earth Power.Description: The user makes the ground under the foe erupt with power. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

Earthquake.Description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes those around it.

Echoed Voice.Description: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, it does greater damage.

Egg Bomb.Description: A large egg is hurled at the target with maximum force to inflict damage.

Electro Ball.Description: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the damage.

Electroweb.Description: The user captures and attacks opposing Pokémon by using an electric net. It reduces the targets' Speed stat.

Embargo.Description: It prevents the foe from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

Ember.Description: The target is attacked with small flames. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Encore.Description: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.

Endeavor.Description: An attack move that cuts down the target's HP to equal the user's HP.

Endure.Description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

Energy Ball.Description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

Entrainment.Description: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target's Ability the same as the user's.

Eruption.Description: The user attacks the opposing team with explosive fury. The lower the user's HP, the less powerful this attack becomes.

Explosion.Description: The user explodes to inflict damage on those around it. The user faints upon using this move.

Extrasensory.Description: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. It may also make the target flinch.

ExtremeSpeed.Description: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This attack always goes before any other move.

Facade.Description: An attack move that doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or has paralysis.

Faint Attack.Description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

Fake Out.Description: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

Fake Tears.Description: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.

False Swipe.Description: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

FeatherDance.Description: The user covers the target's body with a mass of down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

Feint.Description: An attack that hits a target using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.

Fiery Dance.Description: Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its wings. It may also raise the user's Sp. Atk stat.

Final Gambit.Description: The user risks everything to attack its target. The user faints but does damage equal to the user's HP.

Fire Blast.Description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Fire Fang.Description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it burned.

Fire Pledge.Description: A column of fire hits opposing Pokémon. When used with its Grass equivalent, its damage increases into a vast sea of fire.

Fire Punch.Description: The target is punched with a fiery fist. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Fire Spin.Description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

Fissure.Description: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target instantly faints if it hits.

Flail.Description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. It becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

Flame Burst.Description: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.

Flame Charge.Description: The user cloaks itself with flame and attacks. Building up more power, it raises the user's Speed stat.

Flame Wheel.Description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Flamethrower.Description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Flare Blitz.Description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. The user sustains serious damage and may leave the target burned.

Flash.Description: Looses a powerful blast of light that cuts accuracy.

Flash Cannon.Description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Flatter.Description: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, it also raises the target's Sp. Atk stat.

Fling.Description: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.

Fly.Description: The user soars, then strikes its target on the second turn. It can also be used for flying anywhere on the pokemon.

Focus Blast.Description: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

Focus Energy.Description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

Focus Punch.Description: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. It will fail if the user is hit before it is used.

Follow Me.Description: The user draws attention to itself, making all targets take aim only at the user.

Force Palm.Description: The target is attacked with a shock wave. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Foresight.Description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

Foul Play.Description: The user turns the target's power against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the damage.

Freeze Shock.Description: On the second turn, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice. It may leave the target with paralysis.

Frenzy Plant.Description: The user slams the target with an enormous tree. The user can't move on the next turn.

Frost Breath.Description: The user blows a cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.

Frustration.Description: An attack that is stronger if the trainer is disliked.

Fury Attack.Description: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

Fury Cutter.Description: The target is slashed with scythes or claws. Its power increases if it hits in succession.

Fury Swipes.Description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to five times in quick succession.

Fusion Bolt.Description: The user throws down a giant thunderbolt. This attack does greater damage when influenced by an enormous flame.

Fusion Flare.Description: The user brings down a giant flame. This attack does greater damage when influenced by an enormous thunderbolt.

Future Sight.Description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

Gastro Acid.Description: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.

Gear Grind.Description: The user attacks by throwing two steel gears at its target.

Giga Drain.Description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Giga Impact.Description: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.

Glaciate.Description: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This attack reduces the targets' Speed stat.

Glare.Description: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

Grass Knot.Description: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the damage.

Grass Pledge.Description: A column of grass hits opposing Pokémon. When used with its water equivalent, its damage increases into a vast swamp.

GrassWhistle.Description: The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the target into a deep sleep.

Gravity.Description: Gravity is intensified for five turns, making moves involving flying unusable and negating Levitate.

Growl.Description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the foe less wary. The target’s Attack stat is lowered.

Growth.Description: The user’s body is forced to grow all at once. It raises the Sp. Atk stat.

Grudge.Description: If the user faints, the user's grudge fully depletes the PP of the opponent's move that knocked it out.

Guard Split.Description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of its target's.

Guard Swap.Description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def with the target.

Guillotine.Description: A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers. The target will faint instantly if this attack hits.

Gunk Shot.Description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. It may also poison the target.

Gust.Description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

Gyro Ball.Description: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.

Hail.Description: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.

Hammer Arm.Description: The user swings and hits with its strong and heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however.

Harden.Description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

Haze.Description: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

Head Charge.Description: The user charges its head into its target, using its powerful guard hair. It also damages the user a little.

Head Smash.Description: The user attacks the target with a hazardous, full-power headbutt. The user also takes terrible damage.

Headbutt.Description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. It may also make the target flinch.

Heal Bell.Description: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status problems of all the party Pokémon.

Heal Block.Description: For five turns, the user prevents the opposing team from using any moves, Abilities, or held items that recover HP.

Heal Order.Description: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.

Heal Pulse.Description: The user emits a healing pulse which restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP.

Healing Wish.Description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status cured.

Heart Stamp.Description: The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act makes the target less wary. It may also make the target flinch.

Heart Swap.Description: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the target.

Heat Crash.Description: The user slams its target with its flame-covered body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the damage.

Heat Wave.Description: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing team. It may also leave targets with a burn.

Heavy Slam.Description: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater its damage.

Helping Hand.Description: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of its attack.

Hex.Description: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status problems.

Hi Jump Kick.Description: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

Hidden Power.Description: An attack that varies in type and intensity depending on the user.

Hone Claws.Description: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

Horn Attack.Description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

Horn Drill.Description: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. If it hits, the target faints instantly.

Horn Leech.Description: The user drains the target's energy with its horns. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Howl.Description: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, boosting its Attack stat.

Hurricane.Description: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. It may also confuse the target.

Hydro Cannon.Description: The target is hit with a watery blast. The user must rest on the next turn, however.

Hydro Pump.Description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

Hyper Beam.Description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user must rest on the next turn to regain its energy.

Hyper Fang.Description: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. It may also make the target flinch.

Hyper Voice.Description: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.

Hypnosis.Description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

Ice Ball.Description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

Ice Beam.Description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.

Ice Burn.Description: On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the target. This may leave the target with a burn.

Ice Fang.Description: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

Ice Punch.Description: The target is punched with an icy fist. It may also leave the target frozen.

Ice Shard.Description: The user flash freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

Icicle Crash.Description: The user attacks by harshly dropping an icicle onto the target. It may also make the target flinch.

Icicle Spear.Description: The user launches sharp icicles at the target. It strikes two to five times in a row.

Icy Wind.Description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. It also reduces the targets' Speed stat.

Imprison.Description: If the opponents know any move also known by the user, the opponents are prevented from using it.

Incinerate.Description: The user attacks the target with fire. If the target is holding a Berry, the Berry becomes burnt up and unusable.

Inferno.Description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. It leaves the target with a burn.

Ingrain.Description: The user lays roots that restore its HP on every turn. Because it is rooted, it can't switch out.

Iron Defense.Description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

Iron Head.Description: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. It may also make the target flinch.

Iron Tail.Description: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. It may also lower the target's Defense stat

Judgment.Description: The user releases countless shots of light at the target. Its type varies with the kind of Plate the user is holding.

Jump Kick.Description: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.

Karate Chop.Description: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.

Kinesis.Description: The user distracts the target by bending a spoon. It lowers the target's accuracy.

Knock Off.Description: The user slaps down the target's held item, preventing that item from being used in the battle.

Last Resort.Description: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

Lava Plume.Description: An inferno of scarlet flames torches everything around the user. It may leave targets with a burn.

Leaf Blade.Description: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.

Leaf Storm.Description: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The attack's recoil harshly reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

Leaf Tornado.Description: The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp leaves. This attack may also lower the foe's accuracy.

Leech Life.Description: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Leech Seed.Description: A seed is planted on the foe. It steals some HP from the foe to heal the user on every turn.

Leer.Description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

Lick.Description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Light Screen.Description: A wall of light cuts damage from Sp. Atk attacks for five turns.

Lock-On.Description: The user takes sure aim at the target. It ensures the next attack does not fail to hit the target.

Lovely Kiss.Description: With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on the target. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

Low Kick.Description: A powerful low kick that makes the foe fall over. It inflicts greater damage on heavier foes.

Low Sweep.Description: The user attacks the target's legs swiftly, reducing the target's Speed stat.

Lucky Chant.Description: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon from landing critical hits.

Lunar Dance.Description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.

Luster Purge.Description: The user lets loose a damaging burst of light. It may also harshly reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

Mach Punch.Description: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. It is certain to strike first.

Magic Coat.Description: A barrier reflects back to the target moves like Leech Seed and moves that damage status.

Magic Room.Description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's held items lose their effects for five turns.

Magical Leaf.Description: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack will not miss.

Magma Storm.Description: The target becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for four to five turns.

Magnet Bomb.Description: The user launches steel bombs that stick to the target. This attack will not miss.

Magnet Rise.Description: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

Magnitude.Description: A ground-shaking attack of random intensity.

Me First.Description: The user tries to cut ahead of the target to steal and use the target's intended move with greater power.

Mean Look.Description: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

Meditate.Description: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

Mega Drain.Description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Mega Kick.Description: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

Mega Punch.Description: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

Megahorn.Description: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.

Memento.Description: The user faints when using this move. In return, it harshly lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk.

Metal Burst.Description: The user retaliates with much greater power against the target that last inflicted damage on it.

Metal Claw.Description: The target is raked with steel claws. It may also raise the user's Attack stat.

Metal Sound.Description: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly reduces the target's Sp. Def stat.

Meteor Mash.Description: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. It may also raise the user's Attack.

Metronome.Description: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

Milk Drink.Description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP. May also be used in the field to heal HP.

Mimic.Description: The user copies the target's last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.

Mind Reader.Description: The user senses the target's movements with its mind to ensure its next attack does not miss the target.

Minimize.Description: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.

Miracle Eye.Description: Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by Psychic-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

Mirror Coat.Description: A retaliation move that counters any special attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

Mirror Move.Description: The user counters the target by mimicking the target's last move.

Mirror Shot.Description: The user looses a flash of energy at the target from its polished body. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

Mist.Description: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.

Mist Ball.Description: A mistlike flurry of down envelops and damages the target. It may also harshly lower the target's Sp. Atk.

Moonlight.Description: The user restores its own HP. It fails during the day.

Morning Sun.Description: The user restores its own HP. It fails during the night.

Mud Bomb.Description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

Mud Shot.Description: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. It also reduces the target's Speed.

Mud Sport.Description: Weakens Electric- type attacks while the user is in the battle.

Mud-Slap.Description: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

Muddy Water.Description: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the opposing team. It may also lower the targets' accuracy.

Nasty Plot.Description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk.

Natural Gift.Description: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines its type and power.

Nature Power.Description: An attack that makes use of nature’s power. Its effects vary depending on the user’s environment.

Needle Arm.Description: The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms. It may also make the target flinch.

Night Daze.Description: The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its target. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

Night Shade.Description: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage matching the user's level.

Night Slash.Description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

Nightmare.Description: A sleeping target sees a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn.

Octazooka.Description: The user attacks by spraying ink in the target's face or eyes. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

Odor Sleuth.Description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit with Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

Ominous Wind.Description: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. It may also raise all the user's stats at once.

Outrage.Description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.

Overheat.Description: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil harshly reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

Pain Split.Description: The user adds its HP to the target's HP, then equally shares the combined HP with the target.

Pay Day.Description: Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.

Payback.Description: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user can use this attack after the target, its power is doubled.

Peck.Description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

Perish Song.Description: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

Petal Dance.Description: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

Pin Missile.Description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

Pluck.Description: The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

Poison Fang.Description: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. It may also leave the target badly poisoned.

Poison Gas.Description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon. It may poison those hit.

Poison Jab.Description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. It may also poison the target.

Poison Powder.Description: A cloud of poisonous dust is scattered on the foe. It may poison the target.

Poison Sting.Description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

Poison Tail.Description: The user hits the target with its tail. It may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

Pound.Description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

Powder Snow.Description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. It may also freeze the targets.

Power Gem.Description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

Power Split.Description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target's.

Power Swap.Description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk with the target.

Power Trick.Description: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack with its Defense stat.

Power Whip.Description: The user violently whirls its vines or tentacles to harshly lash the target.

Present.Description: The user attacks by giving the target a gift with a hidden trap. It restores HP sometimes, however.

Protect.Description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

Psybeam.Description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

Psych Up.Description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

Psychic.Description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp.Def stat.

Psycho Boost.Description: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil harshly reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

Psycho Cut.Description: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily.

Psycho Shift.Description: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status problems to the target.

Psyshock.Description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

Psystrike.Description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

Psywave.Description: The target is attacked with an odd psychic wave. The attack varies in intensity.

Punishment.Description: This attack's power increases the more the target has powered up with stat changes.

Pursuit.Description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.

Quash.Description: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

Quick Attack.Description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

Quick Guard.Description: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises.

Quiver Dance.Description: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. It boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

Rage.Description: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.

Rage Powder.Description: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at the user.

Rain Dance.Description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves.

Rapid Spin.Description: A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

Razor Leaf.Description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Razor Shell.Description: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This attack may also lower the target's Defense stat.

Razor Wind.Description: A two-turn attack. Blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.

Recover.Description: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

Recycle.Description: The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

Reflect.Description: A wondrous wall is put up to suppress damage from physical attacks for five turns.

Reflect Type.Description: The user reflects the target's type, making it the same type as the target.

Refresh.Description: The user rests to cure itself of a poisoning, burn, or paralysis.

Relic Song.Description: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of those listening. It may also induce sleep.

Rest.Description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user's HP and heals any status problem.

Retaliate.Description: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this attack's damage increases.

Return.Description: This attack move grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.

Revenge.Description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

Reversal.Description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

Roar.Description: The target is scared off and replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

Roar of Time.Description: The user blasts the target with power that distorts even time. The user must rest on the next turn.

Rock Blast.Description: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in quick succession.

Rock Climb.Description: The user attacks the target by smashing into it with incredible force. It may also confuse the target.

Rock Polish.Description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It sharply raises the Speed stat.

Rock Slide.Description: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing team to inflict damage. They may also make the targets flinch.

Rock Smash.Description: The user attacks with a punch that can shatter a rock. It may also lower the target's Defense stat

Rock Throw.Description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack

Rock Tomb.Description: Boulders are hurled at the target. It also lowers the target's Speed by preventing its movement.

Rock Wrecker.Description: The user launches a huge boulder at the target to attack. It must rest on the next turn, however.

Role Play.Description: The user mimics the target completely, copying the target's natural Ability.

Rolling Kick.Description: The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick. It may also make the target flinch.

Rollout.Description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

Roost.Description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

Round.Description: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round and make the attack do greater damage.

Sacred Fire.Description: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Sacred Sword.Description: The user attacks by slicing with its long horns. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

Safeguard.Description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.

Sand Tomb.Description: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm for four to five turns.

Sand-Attack.Description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing its accuracy.

Sandstorm.Description: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except the Rock, Ground, and Steel types.

Scald.Description: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Scary Face.Description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly reduce its speed stat.

Scratch.Description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

Screech.Description: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

Searing Shot.Description: An inferno of scarlet flames torches everything around the user. It may leave the target with a burn.

Secret Power.Description: The user attacks the target with a secret power. Its added effects vary depending on the user's environment.

Secret Sword.Description: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in the horn does physical damage to the target.

Seed Bomb.Description: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

Seed Flare.Description: The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack its target. It may harshly lower the target's Sp. Def.

Seismic Toss.Description: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

Selfdestruct.Description: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

Shadow Ball.Description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Shadow Claw.Description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Shadow Force.Description: The user disappears, then strikes the target on the second turn. It hits even if the target protects itself.

Shadow Punch.Description: The user throws a punch from the shadows. The punch lands without fail.

Shadow Sneak.Description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

Sharpen.Description: The user reduces its polygon count to make itself more jagged, raising the Attack stat.

Sheer Cold.Description: The target is attacked with a blast of absolute-zero cold. The target instantly faints if it hits.

Shell Smash.Description: The user breaks its shell, lowering its Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raising Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

Shift Gear.Description: The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack and sharply raising its Speed.

Shock Wave.Description: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack cannot be evaded.

Signal Beam.Description: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. It may also confuse the target.

Silver Wind.Description: The target is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It may also raise all the user's stats.

Simple Beam.Description: The user's mysterious psychic wave changes the target's Ability to Simple.

Sing.Description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

Sketch.Description: It enables the user to permanently learn the move last used by the target. Once used, Sketch disappears.

Skill Swap.Description: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.

Skull Bash.Description: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense in the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.

Sky Attack.Description: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. It may also make the target flinch.

Sky Drop.Description: The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it during the next turn. The target cannot attack while in the sky.

Sky Uppercut.Description: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.

Slack Off.Description: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP.

Slam.Description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

Slash.Description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

Sleep Powder.Description: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the foe.

Sleep Talk.Description: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

Sludge.Description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.

Sludge Bomb.Description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.

Sludge Wave.Description: It swamps the area around the user with a giant sludge wave. It may also poison those hit.

Smack Down.Description: The user throws a stone or projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when it's hit.

SmellingSalt.Description: This attack inflicts double damage on a target with paralysis. It also cures the target's paralysis, however.

Smog.Description: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. It may also poison the target.

SmokeScreen.Description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. It reduces the target's accuracy.

Snarl.Description: The user yells as if it is ranting about something, making the target's Sp. Atk stat decrease.

Snatch.Description: The user steals the effects of any healing or stat-changing move the opponent attempts to use.

Snore.Description: An attack that can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may make the target flinch.

Soak.Description: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target's type to Water.

Softboiled.Description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP. May also be used in the field to heal HP.

SolarBeam.Description: A 2-turn move that blasts the foe with absorbed energy in the 2nd turn.

SonicBoom.Description: The target is hit with a destructive shock wave that always inflicts 20 HP damage.

Spacial Rend.Description: The user tears the target along with the space around it. Critical hits land more easily.

Spark.Description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Spider Web.Description: The user ensnares the target with thin, gooey silk so it can't flee from battle.

Spike Cannon.Description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

Spikes.Description: The user lays a trap of spikes at the opposing team's feet. The trap hurts Pokémon that switch into battle.

Spit Up.Description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack. The more power is stored, the greater the damage.

Spite.Description: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

Splash.Description: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

Spore.Description: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

Stealth Rock.Description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opponent's team. The trap hurts opponents that switch into battle.

Steamroller.Description: The user crushes its targets by rolling over them with its rolled-up body. This attack may make the target flinch.

Steel Wing.Description: The target is hit with wings of steel. It may also raise the user's Defense stat.

Stockpile.Description: The user charges up power and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def. The move can be used three times.

Stomp.Description: The target is stomped with a big foot. It may also make the target flinch.

Stone Edge.Description: The user stabs the foe with sharpened stones from below. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Stored Power.Description: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the damage.

Storm Throw.Description: The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

Strength.Description: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power. This move can also be used to move boulders.

String Shot.Description: The targets are bound with silk blown from the user's mouth. This silk reduces the targets' Speed stat.

Struggle.Description: An attack that is used in desperation only if the user has no PP. It also hurts the user slightly.

Struggle Bug.Description: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets' Sp. Atk stat is reduced.

Stun Spore.Description: The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing powder. It may leave the target with paralysis.

Submission.Description: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. It also hurts the user slightly.

Substitute.Description: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user's decoy.

Sucker Punch.Description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack, however.

Sunny Day.Description: The sun blazes for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves.

Super Fang.Description: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. It cuts the target's HP to half.

Superpower.Description: The user attacks the target with great power. However, it also lowers the user's Attack and Defense.

Supersonic.Description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body. It may confuse the target.

Surf.Description: It swamps the area around the user with a giant wave. It can also be used for crossing water.

Swagger.Description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, it also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.

Swallow.Description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP. Storing more power heals more HP.

Sweet Kiss.Description: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

Sweet Scent.Description: A pleasant aroma that distracts the target, making the opponent easier to hit.

Swift.Description: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing team. This attack never misses.

Switcheroo.Description: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

Swords Dance.Description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.

Synchronoise.Description: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.

Synthesis.Description: Allows HP to be restored by the sunlight. In battle, half the user's max HP is restored.

Tackle.Description: Charges the foe with a full-body tackle.

Tail Glow.Description: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, drastically raising its Sp. Atk stat.

Tail Slap.Description: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the Pokémon two to five times in a row.

Tail Whip.Description: A move that lowers the target's Defence. Useful against tough, armored Pokemon.

Tailwind.Description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon for four turns.

Take Down.Description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. It also damages the user a little.

Taunt.Description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

Techno Blast.Description: The user fires a beam of light at its target. The type changes depending on the Drive the user holds.

Teeter Dance.Description: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses the Pokémon around it.

Telekinesis.Description: The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.

Teleport.Description: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon. It can also warp to the last Pokémon Center visited.

Thief.Description: The user attacks and steals the target's item simultaneously. It can't steal if the user holds an item.

Thrash.Description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.

Thunder.Description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Thunder Fang.Description: The user bites with electrified fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

Thunder Punch.Description: The target is punched with an electrified fist. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Thunder Wave.Description: A weak electric charge is launched at the target. It causes paralysis if hit.

ThunderShock.Description: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Thunderbolt.Description: A strong electric blast is loosed at the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Tickle.Description: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.

Torment.Description: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

Toxic.Description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

Toxic Spikes.Description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the opponent's feet. They poison opponents that switch into battle.

Transform.Description: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.

Tri Attack.Description: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or leave the target with paralysis.

Trick.Description: The user catches the target off guard and swaps its held item with its own.

Trick Room.Description: The user creates a bizarre space in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

Triple Kick.Description: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.

Trump Card.Description: The fewer PP this move has, the greater its attack power.

Twineedle.Description: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. It may also poison the target.

Twister.Description: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing team. It may also make targets flinch.

U-Turn.Description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

Uproar.Description: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. Over that time, no one can fall asleep.

V-Create.Description: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. It lowers the user's Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

Vacuum Wave.Description: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

Venoshock.Description: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. Its power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

ViceGrip.Description: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

Vine Whip.Description: The foe is struck with slender, whiplike vines.

Vital Throw.Description: The user attacks last. In return, this throw move is guaranteed not to miss.

Volt Switch.Description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

Volt Tackle.Description: The user electrifies itself, then charges. It causes considerable damage to the user and may leave the target with paralysis.

Wake-Up Slap.Description: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. It also wakes the target up, however.

Water Gun.Description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

Water Pledge.Description: A column of water strikes the target. When combined with its fire equivalent, the damage increases and a rainbow appears.

Water Pulse.Description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the target.

Water Sport.Description: The user soaks itself with water. The move weakens Fire-type moves while the user is in the battle.

Water Spout.Description: The user spouts water to damage the opposing team. The lower the user's HP, the less powerful it becomes.

Waterfall.Description: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.

Weather Ball.Description: An attack move that varies in power and type depending on the weather.

Whirlpool.Description: Traps foes in a violent swirling whirlpool for four to five turns.

Whirlwind.Description: The target is blown away, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

Wide Guard.Description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn. If used in succession, its chances of failing rises.

Wild Charge.Description: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. It also damages the user a little.

Will-O-Wisp.Description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

Wing Attack.Description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

Wish.Description: One turn after this move is used, the target's HP is restored by half the user's maximum HP.

Withdraw.Description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

Wonder Room.Description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

Wood Hammer.Description: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. The user also sustains serious damage.

Work Up.Description: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.

Worry Seed.Description: A seed that causes worry is planted on the foe. It prevents sleep by making its ability Insomnia.

Wrap.Description: A long body or vines are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

Wring Out.Description: The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP the target has, the greater this attack’s power.

X-Scissor.Description: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

Yawn.Description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

Zap Cannon.Description: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

Zen Headbutt.Description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. It may also make the target flinch.
